name: MVM9: Chibits
description:
It's been 10 years since a toxic miasma covered the planet, forcing the last remaining humans to flee into space. Bits, a newly activated Chibit, awakens in a scrapheap. What will he find in the nearby uninhabited factory and beyond?

ControlsMove Left / RightA / DJumpSpaceCrouchSUse ElevatorW (to go up) or S (to go down)SwordJBlasterKMapMSaveW (when standing at a save point)Mute MusicV List of power ups
  • Blaster
  • Blaster Charged Shot
  • 3x Sword upgrades
  • 3x Health upgrades
  • 4x Energy upgrades
  • 3x Zone Maps
Before you play As of now the game should be fully functional incl. the boss level, exploration is advised for easier gameplay and finding better paths. Troubleshooting

> Can't get to factory / turn on the elevator
Explore a bit more or check out the guide provided

> Can't defeat the boss

Examine the room more or check out the guide provided

If you prefer going through the game fast, here's quick walkthrough for you:
https://pastebin.com/ZaCzmVZb Known bugs

> Crash later in game
That probably means you made it to the boss room. Nice! Unfortunately we did not have time to debug and fix this issue, so if you want the full experience, please consider downloading the standalone version! Thank you!

Development

Chibits was developed for the Metroidvania Month 9 game jam that took place from August 15th, 2020 to September 15, 2020 (https://itch.io/jam/metroidvania-month-9). Heavy inspiration for gameplay comes from games such as Metroid, Megaman, Celeste, and Hyper Light Drifter.

Even though the jam lasted for a whole month, the game is fairly short and not terribly difficult. Not every planned feature was able to make it into this build. We hope you enjoy playing through it as much as we enjoyed making it!

There are plans to make it into a full game. This page will be updated later with more information about it. If you'd like to chat with us about this game or any of our other games, join our Discord server here: https://discord.gg/qkrV9jf
